name: visualization
content:

[ U ] the act of visualizing something or someone (= forming a picture of it in your mind): She spent 25 years developing self-help techniques which involve meditation and visualization. an exercise that can help you with your visualization of a successful future
[ U or C ] the act or an example of creating an image, etc. to represent something: I’ve been seeing a lot of interesting work with data visualization happening lately. You can design interactive visualizations of results. See
visualize
More examplesFewer examplesSave time each day for relaxation and positive visualization.The substance is used in radiography to permit visualization of internal body structures. Information visualization offers a unique method to reveal hidden patterns in a visual presentation.
